about_the_game:
DEEPMESS is a micro-tactics descent into the mind of god. Guide the Pink Slime Mold from the walls of god's cave, where it feeds on leftover thoughts, to carve a new home directly inside the source—the big one's brain.



Armed with hammer and nail, plunge your way down through layers of flesh and bone while fighting off divine enemies. Strategize vertically layer-by-layer as you descend through intense combat and lobotomize god.

FEATURES


Lobotomize god through micro-tactics
Share one big hammer amongst your units—attack enemies and strike the Nail to destroy the current floor and fall directly into the next floor of combat!


Beef up your arsenal at the Slime Bodega
Upgrade your unit’s abilities to influence the vertical strategy. Burst open new God Thoughts that provide passive effects on your run. Build up your squad while traversing through the brain-y biomes of god's head.


Survive a drum-and-bass-filled bio-hellscape
Deadly enemies and hazards fill squishy environments themed around bone, flesh, and brains. Look before your leap as you crash through layers of combat.


Play the demo now!

DEEPMESS is ongoing development, and planned updates to the demo are coming! Wishlist and join the DEEPMESS Discord to support development!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoon violence and some crude language.
